basics.name: Silvia De Benedictis
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Summer, 2024.

highlights: Arrange appointments, monitor and restock office supplies, and help with administrative tasks
Responsible for computing and proofreading data such as timesheets, reports, and records.
Accomplished in building a web-page with a team of 4 interns
Developed UI for Barclays Investment bank operations users to submit requests for retrieval of archived historical reports
Addressed day-to-day challenges related to project with daily meetings with team leads and iterative development. Led the team to discuss the next steps for web-page
Followed directions and guidance of senior staff members to understand the fintech ecosystem
Built web applications and presented final app

awards.title: First Place
awards.summary: My team won first place in the Tri-State ExploreCSR Competition. See my portfolio site for more details.

awards.title: Alumni Scholarship Recipient
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to high school alumni representing each major.
